aboutUs: IZGARA is a new place in town â€” a new taste and a new atmosphere. We know that people come not only to eat, but to enjoy a memorable experience. That is why the IZGARA team is a mix of chefs, designers, baristas, service professionals, and passionate creators who truly love what they do.
refundUs:
RETURNS & REFUND POLICY

Thank you for shopping with us. We hope you enjoy our products, but if for any reason you are not satisfied, we are here to help.

Return period

You may request a return within 7 calendar days from the date of purchase.
If more than 7 days have passed since your purchase, unfortunately we cannot offer a refund or exchange.

Condition of returned items

To be eligible for a return, the item must:

be unused

be in the same condition as received

contain all original accessories and components

be in its original packaging

Items that are damaged, altered, or missing parts not due to our error will not be accepted.

Non-returnable items

Certain types of goods cannot be returned, including but not limited to:

perishable goods (food, beverages, flowers)

newspapers, magazines, printed media

intimate or hygiene products

cosmetics and personal care items already opened

hazardous materials, chemicals

flammable liquids or gases

digital or downloadable products

gift cards

Please do not send your purchase back to the manufacturer.

Proof of purchase

To complete your return, we require:

receipt, or

order confirmation, or

other valid proof of purchase

Returns without proof of purchase may be refused.

Partial refunds

In some cases, only partial refunds may be granted, for example:

items with visible signs of use

opened CDs, DVDs, software, games, or vinyl records

items not in original condition

items returned after the return period but within 30 days at our discretion

Refund process

Once your returned item is received and inspected, we will notify you by email or message regarding:

receipt of the item

approval or rejection of the refund

If the refund is approved, it will be processed and issued to the original method of payment within a reasonable number of days. Processing time may vary depending on your bank or payment provider.

Exchanges

We only replace items if they are defective or damaged upon receipt. If you need to exchange an item for the same product, please contact us before sending it.

Shipping costs

Shipping costs are generally non-refundable. If you receive a refund, the cost of return shipping may be deducted from your refund unless otherwise stated.
